EmailTemplate.name: 17.NokION.XLE.Retail.N.G.N.17804.Retail Nurture.Email 6
EmailTemplate.subject: Retailer blueprint for private and hybrid cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nine steps to private and hybrid cloud for retailers Moving a large retail business to a secure and scalable infrastructure requires a private-hybrid cloud model and network transformation.
Read our application note, “Stairway to Cloud” <[[https://resources.ext.nokia.com/asset/195479]]>, to learn about the best practices and steps to connect your private-hybrid cloud infrastructure. Sincerely,Cindy BergevinHead of Retail Marketing, NokiaEmail: cindy.bergevin@nokia.com <[[mailto:cindy.bergevin@nokia.com]]>Visit https://networks.nokia.com/retail <[[https://networks.nokia.com/retail]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
